statements: DELETE FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND accessory_name = 'Gaming Mouse';
DELETE FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending' AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM delivery_status WHERE status = 'pending' AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shipping_orders WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM delivery_status WHERE status = 'delivered');
DELETE FROM ShippingCompanies WHERE company_id = 50 AND contact_person = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 100 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM accessories WHERE supplier_id = 500 AND price > 50.00;
